reviews.text: We stopped by for the music and meet friends but the food was amazing. They have breakfast now and I wish we were local. I grew up in Brooklyn N Y and my little flavor biscuits in my mouth crave pizza üçï once in awhile. We had to go back to try some of the other food on the menu and we were delighted.

Been loving Trail Rider Pizza since they served out of a small shack in Molly's parking lot. They get better every year. Most excellent service, fun atmosphere,  and mist importantly, GREAT FOOD. Check out some pics of the Cedar Crest Pizza - we chose the take and bake option and it was easy-peasy to cook when we were ready for our fresh, hot pizza!

Stopped in to try one of their gluten free pizzas and it was fantastic. We have the Taos and the favor was delicious. The crust - gluten-free- was the best I have tried to date. It was crisp with a slightly chewy center. 10 out of 10. And no issues or gluten reaction today. Perfect.

Just moved to the area and thought we‚Äôd give this place a try due to it many vegan and vegetarian options. Long story short we loved all the food. Tasted freshly made with good sized portions. Will definitely be back.

We had a great time dining in today! The service is very friendly and attentive. The burgers are a 20/10- amazing. We ordered to go initially, but when we got there we wanted to see if we could dine in and they were so very kind and welcoming to let us.
We‚Äôre so happy they are here and have added so much to their new menu- we have always loved their pizza too, but it‚Äôs great having even more options! Definitely a great spot!

recentReviews.text: The southwestern smash burger was incredible!

Worth the wait, great taste. üôÇ
Ease and grace ‚ú®üåü‚≠êüí´‚ú® 99
Nice, quiet atmosphere.  Food was really good.  Between all of us, we had both the burritos and taco plates.  Service was attentive and friendly.

Clean restaurant, very friendly staff, & clean restrooms. The Pizza was a too soggy on the bottom, & our fried appetizer was oily as well, but it was close to closing time. We will definitely give it another shot sometime, hopefully choosing an earlier time will make the difference.

We were ‚Äúthose customers‚Äù who arrived 30 minutes before closing to dine in. On top of that, we were hosting friends in town that have severe food allergies. We couldn‚Äôt just get fast food because of this and we knew Trail Riders has gluten free and dairy free food. They did not disappoint! My friend with celiac‚Äôs disease and dairy intolerance LOVED her pizza. We always enjoy Trailer Riders with their tasty pizza and subs. We appreciate their commitment to service all customers. Thanks for having us!
Absolutely delicious!  I'm looking forward to more trips here.
I asked for a pizza that cost a quarter but he said he couldn‚Äôt because Adrian was just a beh beh so then Steven agreed to do it. Their 6 7 mango mustard dessert is BUSSIN!üòÇüíØ
The taste of that pizza is marvelous!!!

detailedReviews.text: The southwestern smash burger was incredible!

detailedReviews.text:
Worth the wait, great taste. üôÇ

detailedReviews.author: Lori Schutt
detailedReviews.text: Nice, quiet atmosphere.  Food was really good.  Between all of us, we had both the burritos and taco plates.  Service was attentive and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: LiveLaughLove Truth
detailedReviews.text: Clean restaurant, very friendly staff, & clean restrooms. The Pizza was a too soggy on the bottom, & our fried appetizer was oily as well, but it was close to closing time. We will definitely give it another shot sometime, hopefully choosing an earlier time will make the difference.

detailedReviews.author: Jenna P
detailedReviews.text: We were ‚Äúthose customers‚Äù who arrived 30 minutes before closing to dine in. On top of that, we were hosting friends in town that have severe food allergies. We couldn‚Äôt just get fast food because of this and we knew Trail Riders has gluten free and dairy free food. They did not disappoint! My friend with celiac‚Äôs disease and dairy intolerance LOVED her pizza. We always enjoy Trailer Riders with their tasty pizza and subs. We appreciate their commitment to service all customers. Thanks for having us!

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Schierstein
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious!  I'm looking forward to more trips here.

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Arellano
detailedReviews.text: I asked for a pizza that cost a quarter but he said he couldn‚Äôt because Adrian was just a beh beh so then Steven agreed to do it. Their 6 7 mango mustard dessert is BUSSIN!üòÇüíØ

detailedReviews.author: Angelica Vizcaya
detailedReviews.text: The taste of that pizza is marvelous!!!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Gormier
detailedReviews.text: Collin is killing it, always with a good attitude regardless of the circumstances (:

detailedReviews.author: Jay Janssen
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in New Mexico

detailedReviews.author: Peter Dickinson
detailedReviews.text: A great place for lunch after a hike in the mountains.

detailedReviews.author: Thinking Ape
detailedReviews.text:
Hit or miss depending oh who‚Äôs cooking. For example; Monday August 18th 2025 was fantastic. August, Wednesday 20th 2025 was absolutely terrible.  It was dinner for four persons each time. We rely on the local restaurants here and unfortunately Trail Rider is a total crapshoot.
We eat here several times a month. Final decided it was time to leave a review.

Burger patties were hard hockey pucks. Buns were soggy in the center, old and stale around the ends. Garlic bread was rock hard.
Everyone‚Äôs meal was overly salted and
60% of the meals were thrown away.

detailedReviews.author: 386 Deoxys
detailedReviews.text: I love the meat subs. It brings me back to italy

detailedReviews.author: PJ Hill
detailedReviews.text: Great atmosphere with upbeat and fun folks working there. Absolutely the best pizza and the fried green chili strips are simply amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Merrell
detailedReviews.text: Good place for some good food.

detailedReviews.author: Delynn Egan
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I  were seated and it took about 10 minutes to get menus brought to us.  The fly‚Äôs were terrible in the dining area.  Ordered a pepperoni pizza it was pretty good.  Waitress didn‚Äôt impress us at all.  They need to do something about the flies.

detailedReviews.author: Wade McCann
detailedReviews.text: Great little spot with occasional live music. Extremely friendly staff that is informative but not pushy at all. Try the Rueben with in-house smoked pastrami. Wow! Pizza has great crust/texture/taste.

detailedReviews.author: Andrea L Tembreull
detailedReviews.text: Trail Rider Pizza in the East Mountains outside of Albuquerque, and along the Turquoise Trail is a gem! Ashlea the owner has cultivated a wonderful atmosphere where the staff is happy and so are the customers! The food is amazing, especially the new breakfast offerings of breakfast burritos and tacos!

detailedReviews.author: Ginger
detailedReviews.text:
We had a great time dining in today! The service is very friendly and attentive. The burgers are a 20/10- amazing. We ordered to go initially, but when we got there we wanted to see if we could dine in and they were so very kind and welcoming to let us.
We‚Äôre so happy they are here and have added so much to their new menu- we have always loved their pizza too, but it‚Äôs great having even more options! Definitely a great spot!

detailedReviews.author: Gerald Salazar
detailedReviews.text: Nice place , good food

detailedReviews.author: Celia Cortez
detailedReviews.text: Always excellent food. Bring back the pulled pork bbq sandwich üòã

detailedReviews.author: Jazz
detailedReviews.text: Tasty pizza and pasta.

detailedReviews.author: Jason B
detailedReviews.text: Best breakfast burritos in the East Mountains!

detailedReviews.author: Frances Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delicious, but so many flies.

detailedReviews.author: Bethany MacDonald
detailedReviews.text:
Amazing food, amazing people!
Oh and BEST FAJITA TACOS EVER!!!

detailedReviews.author: Lenny Rosen
detailedReviews.text: We stopped by for the music and meet friends but the food was amazing. They have breakfast now and I wish we were local. I grew up in Brooklyn N Y and my little flavor biscuits in my mouth crave pizza üçï once in awhile. We had to go back to try some of the other food on the menu and we were delighted.

detailedReviews.author: Leslie L
detailedReviews.text: If you‚Äôre looking for the best pizza in town, this spot is it! Every bite was packed with flavor and the crust was absolute perfection. Their sandwiches, especially the Reuben, were out of this world. You can really taste the difference because they smoke their own meats in-house, giving everything a unique, rich flavor that you just won‚Äôt find anywhere else. The service was top-notch, friendly, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. The atmosphere had a relaxed, chill vibe that made it easy to just kick back and enjoy the meal. Definitely a place we'll keep coming back to. Defietely worth it!

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Lyford
detailedReviews.text:
Addendum: apparently, after my wife and Dain had been playing at Trail Rider for a few years, Trail Rider decided to change things up, which I completely understand. What pisses me off is whoever took over the scheduling never returned my wife‚Äôs phone calls about perhaps playing sometime down the road. Total lack of courtesy on the part of Trail Rider!!!!! So, not that it will impact their business, but my wife and I won‚Äôt ever be back. And our friends will know why!!!
***************************
My wife, Eileen, and her friend, Dain, play Irish music at Trail Rider every month on a Tuesday night. Just wanted to put that out there, but it doesn‚Äôt affect what I think of the place and the food. Coming from New York way back when (I grew up in Upstate NY‚Ä¶the Adirondacks), I‚Äôm familiar with good NY style pizza. Trail Rider is one of a few in the area that comes the closest to NY pizza. Good selection of beer and the service is very good considering one guy, Kevin, bears the load. He‚Äôs always on the move and does good work considering he‚Äôs by himself. Strong work!! If we lived closer, I‚Äôd be there more frequently. So, good pizza, good beer, good atmosphere, and, of course, good music!!! Give it a try and don‚Äôt be in a hurry. This isn‚Äôt McDonalds or Burger King. Have a seat, enjoy the food/drink, and the music!!! Relax‚Ä¶also, this is a local business, so all the money spent here stays here unlike the chain restaurants.

detailedReviews.author: J. Jungwirth (Jess)
detailedReviews.text: My son was just born and I think he‚Äôs mostly made of Trail Rider pizza! ü§£ Trail Rider is not your average pizza place and I‚Äôm so happy we have something like this in the east mountains. The fresh ingredients really make these pizzas stand out from the rest. The delicious menu and attentive staff are excellent as well.

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Rutan
detailedReviews.text: Trail rider is a great option for an east mountain pizza, and has an extensive gluten free and vegan menu as well!

detailedReviews.author: Misti Richardson
detailedReviews.text: Food is incredible.  Service was not. Waitress walked by 3 times without noticing my drink was empty. I had to refill my own drink

detailedReviews.author: Andy Johnson
detailedReviews.text: This restaurant has the best pizza in the area as well as the best atmosphere. There‚Äôs occasional live music that‚Äôs ok, and the mural on the wall isn‚Äôt creepy and drug themed like the brewery up the road. Come here if you want great pizza in a place that feels normal.

detailedReviews.author: Yvonne Dewitt
detailedReviews.text: Typically eat from here a couple times a month. The food is always great!

detailedReviews.author: Sridev Humphreys
detailedReviews.text: Always quick, delicious, and courteous.

detailedReviews.author: Jade Mcgee
detailedReviews.text: Great food. I have ate here for breakfast  lunch and dinner. Loved everything

detailedReviews.author: Siobhan Keating
detailedReviews.text: Everything was great and on time carry out thank you

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Novak
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza at this place, a little more expensive than say Domino's but you get what you pay for

detailedReviews.author: Scott Glenn
detailedReviews.text: Ordering was simple, walking in and carrying out my order. Wife approved of the Hawaiian pizza with green chili added. We took it up to the crest and enjoyed it. Took leftovers home and had it for breakfast the next day!

detailedReviews.author: Johnny Boudreaux
detailedReviews.text:
2025 update: I am happy to say the place is SOO much better‚Äîvery friendly and attentive staff, great food, and excellent vibes‚Ä¶ not sure what caused the changes but this place is back on my list and at the top of it!  Superb job of making this a great place Trail Rider! üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº

Circa 2022: Terrible customer service... I'll be going to Rumor for pizza from now on. My 1st time @ trail rider: ; I was ignored at the counter for over 10 minutes when I just needed to pickup an online order placed an hour earlier. 2nd time @ trail rider: manager wouldn‚Äôt sell me a drink 20 MINUTES prior to closing while we waited on the kitchen for two pizzas because it was ‚Äútoo close to closing time‚Äù... I love supporting local businesses but I can‚Äôt imagine ever going back to Trail Rider as they seem to behave towards customers however the mood strikes‚Ä¶ goodbye for good

*** 2024 update:  I really want local businesses to thrive, but it‚Äôs obvious that the responses from the (former?) owner to the lower star reviews are qualified in some shape or form.  My 2 cents: don‚Äôt ruin an apology with an excuse.  I‚Äôve been told by some locals that the owners are going through some rough times.  I hope the future is brighter for both of them, and that Trail Rider turns things around and becomes a valued staple of the East Mountain community.  Good luck Ms. Trail Rider‚ÄîI hope to enjoy your offerings again.

detailedReviews.author: Ken O.
detailedReviews.text: Consistently high quality ingredients makes a difference and keeps us coming back. Great menu too, lots of variations on ‚Äúsupreme‚Äù to choose from.

detailedReviews.author: Deanna Lopez
detailedReviews.text: We've been customers of Trail Rider since it began in a small trailer years ago. We've never had a bad meal or experience. This trip was no exception. We ordered beer battered fried green chile strips for an appetizer, and they were very good. We usually order pizza but opted for a smash burger and calzone this time. Both were delicious,  especially with red and green chile on the fries. We highly recommend and will definitely return.

detailedReviews.author: Peter Molnar
detailedReviews.text: Went to dinner on Saturday 6/28. Salads and entree‚Äôs were great. I did have a slice of cheese pizza as an appetizer and thought it tasted great, NY style. However the slice was ridiculously small. As primarily a pizza joint, their slices need to be tasty and of a generous size, not small. I may think twice before ordering slices again.

detailedReviews.author: davide massimiliano forin
detailedReviews.text:
We had a great time at Trail Rider Pizza.
The pizza quality is really good, with a really nice crust and flavorful and rich toppings. The Reuben sandwich was also very good, one of the better ones I‚Äôve had in a while.

We happened to be there on karaoke night, which made the evening especially fun. The whole place has that laid-back, mountain-town feel that really adds to the experience.

The staff is friendly, welcoming, and clearly working hard to keep up. That said, the service was slow, so be prepared to wait a bit.

The beer selection is solid, with a good variety to choose from‚Äîdefinitely a highlight.

As for the interior, it‚Äôs definitely on the rustic side and a bit dated, but it fits the casual vibe of the place. If you're looking for a polished or upscale atmosphere, this probably isn‚Äôt it.
But if you want good american pizza, local flavor, and a relaxed night out, Trail Rider hits the spot.

detailedReviews.author: chris s
detailedReviews.text: liked that they had cool aid to drink ..cherry to top it off..food was good to

detailedReviews.author: B. C. Beaumont
detailedReviews.text: Just moved to the area and thought we‚Äôd give this place a try due to it many vegan and vegetarian options. Long story short we loved all the food. Tasted freshly made with good sized portions. Will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: THE SENTINEL
detailedReviews.text: OUTRAGEOUSLY OVERPRICED!!! All their food, Pizzas, Subs and Sides are priced Three (3) times too High!! $15 for a small 8" Sub that should be $5. And $25 Pizzas??? What are these people smoking?! .. Their Reply will be "We use only the Best and Most Expensive Ingredients" in 3,... 2, ... 1. (Costco or Sam's Club no doubt!) Tiny Frozen Meatballs too!

detailedReviews.author: Eleanore Leichtenberg (Eleanore Hikes)
detailedReviews.text: Yummy pizza (I got the Santa Fe with jalape√±os) and friendly staff!

detailedReviews.author: Karen Bernier
detailedReviews.text: Sauce stingy. Toppings not worth money. Distribution of toppings makes McDonald‚Äôs look good! Not worth the price

detailedReviews.author: Pedro Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: Best resteraunt ever. I'm glad it's here in my back yard!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Simmons
detailedReviews.text: I saw Trail Rider on TicToc about their pizza from New Mexico Pizza Guys. Living in Edgewood not a huge Pizza Barn fan and growing up on the East Coast, I am picky about pizza. I have to say their pizza was very good. It‚Äôs definitely not a NY pizza but still it was VERY tasty! I would definitely go back there for pizza. Their wings were amazing! Last time I had wings that good was in downtown Chicago at Giordno‚Äôs, a famous deep dish pizza restaurant. And Trail Rider is not just a pizza place, they had so many different kinds of food to offer. I am very excited to have found a new place to eat and am looking forward to trying different foods they have to offer.

detailedReviews.author: Greg S
detailedReviews.text: my favorite pizza

detailedReviews.author: Allison Gagliardi
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Sonya Pierce
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Great vegan options and dessert! We will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Winter Prosapio
detailedReviews.text: Such a great calzone! Also outdoor seating is available if you are traveling with a dog.

detailedReviews.author: Mireya Prosapio
detailedReviews.text: The most incredible calzone west of Italy! Great sauce, great fillings, and a deliciously herb covered crust. Stop reading this review and go there to eat already! They also have patio seating which was good as we had our pup with us. We also had their vegan strawberry shortcake and it was one of the most scrumptious desserts ever!

detailedReviews.author: Luke Bertrand
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely amazing experience every visit. The service is kind and they're always so respectful. Best restaurant here in Cedar Crest.

detailedReviews.author: Jodi Wolfel
detailedReviews.text: Food is always EXCELLENT. Cool atmosphere with  fun things going on often. Staff is always busy but friendly, polite and efficient. Never got a wrong order. Great place

detailedReviews.author: Jenna Bruck
detailedReviews.text: Best food we have had in quite awhile! Good gf options and the chili strips are awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Travis Jones
detailedReviews.text: a wonderfully joy-filled establishment. Try the focaccia

detailedReviews.author: Casey Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food, great vibes!

detailedReviews.author: Lois Bradley
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in to try one of their gluten free pizzas and it was fantastic. We have the Taos and the favor was delicious. The crust - gluten-free- was the best I have tried to date. It was crisp with a slightly chewy center. 10 out of 10. And no issues or gluten reaction today. Perfect.

detailedReviews.author: Jose Carlos Garduno
detailedReviews.text: This restaurant is always on point. Never disappoints my three boys, and their options are great for the family. 10/10 recommend you pay them a visit!

detailedReviews.author: Diana Williams
detailedReviews.text: Went on open mic night. Great music, green chili chicken Alfredo was very good. Will go again

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Espindola
detailedReviews.text: I love Kevin, he is more sentient and valuable than anyone on this planet, and hail the purist form of being. I have been blessed.

detailedReviews.author: jesercaofwonderland
detailedReviews.text:
Being an east coast girl I feell its a little unfair to review, but Im compelled to say something.
The dough tasted like the pre frozen kind thats left to proof. The sauce was way to salty and the middle kinda soggy. Honestly, the money could have been better spent elsewhere, or even making one at home.
2/10 would NOT recomend. Big "skip this" IMO. Make the drive to town instead.

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Barrett
detailedReviews.text: Gather there for family birthdays, because everyone loves the menu variety and delicious food. If you haven't been there yet, you are missing out. Vegan and Gluten options.

detailedReviews.author: Christian Broadhurst
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was really good.

detailedReviews.author: avelina rimbert-mcmillan
detailedReviews.text: Food is allways good.

detailedReviews.author: David Hickey
detailedReviews.text: The cheeseburger pizza is delicious as well as their sandwiches, pasta, and Strombolis

detailedReviews.author: TheRobbyhjake13
detailedReviews.text: Great choices for vegan eaters Best pizza around

detailedReviews.author: Steven Ziff
detailedReviews.text: Pizza of the Gods!

detailedReviews.author: Phil Newmam
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food, fun atmosphere, reasonable prices.

detailedReviews.author: D_ Rob_
detailedReviews.text: A great place to stop at!!

detailedReviews.author: R T
detailedReviews.text: Best smoked Reuben sandwich around. Great pizza too.

detailedReviews.author: Charlene Bruton
detailedReviews.text: Love the hand battered zucchini with green chile ranch dip!

detailedReviews.author: Lindsey Train
detailedReviews.text: I just got the New House Smoked Pastrami Reuben and it is TOP NOTCH!! That beautiful smoked flavor, I recommend 100%!

detailedReviews.author: james klar
detailedReviews.text: Dined in, service was quick, great pizza and beer. Will be back

detailedReviews.author: Malina Scardino
detailedReviews.text: The food was absolutely delicious, but the customer service left much to be desired. Unfortunately, the staff was quite rude, which really dampened the experience.

detailedReviews.author: Doreen Duran
detailedReviews.text: First time eating here, great food, great employees!

detailedReviews.author: Chuck Blood
detailedReviews.text: Prompt and courteous service. It seems like a place to bring your family that will make you put your phone down and enjoy the company.

detailedReviews.author: jacob generis
detailedReviews.text: A burrito with fries instead of potatoes ends up costing 12 bucks total rip off no good

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the gluten-free and dairy-free options that cater to those with food allergies, ensuring everyone can enjoy a meal without worry. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The atmosphere is consistently praised as quiet, friendly, and upbeat, making it a perfect spot for a relaxed dining experience. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The pizza is frequently described as the best in New Mexico, with a marvelous taste and great crust texture. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent food quality and customer service - review management can address this concern
Negative reviews about pricing and value perception - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times and slow service - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
